DOC.brief_summary: To compare effect BI 1744 CL versus placebo exercise tolerance 6 week treatment patient Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Treatment BI 1744 CL ( 5 10 mcg ) Versus Placebo Exercise Endurance Time During Constant Work Rate Cycle Ergometry II
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Signed informed consent prior participation . 2 . Diagnosis chronic obstructive pulmonary disease postbronchodilator FEV1 ( Forced Expiratory Volume 1 sec ) < 80 % predict normal postbronchodilator FEV1 ( Forced Expiratory Volume 1 sec ) /FVC < 70 % Visit 1 . 3 . Male female 40 75 year age . 4 . Current exsmokers smoke history 10pack year . 5 . Able perform technically acceptable pulmonary function test , multiple exercise test able maintain record . 6 . Able inhale medication competent manner metereddose inhaler Respimat inhaler . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Patients clinically relevant abnormal baseline haematology , blood chemistry , urinalysis ; patient SGOT > x2 ULN , SGPT > x2 ULN , bilirubin > x2 ULN creatinine > x2 ULN . 2 . Patients history asthma and/or total blood eosinophil count 600 cells/mm3 . 3 . Patients thyrotoxicosis , paroxysmal tachycardia ( > 100 beat per minute ) . 4 . Patients history myocardial infarction within 1 year screen visit , unstable lifethreatening cardiac arrhythmia , hospitalization heart failure within past year , know active tuberculosis , malignancy patient undergone resection , radiation therapy chemotherapy within last five year , lifethreatening pulmonary obstruction , cystic fibrosis , clinically evident bronchiectasis , significant alcohol drug abuse contraindication exercise . 5 . Patients undergone thoracotomy pulmonary resection . 6 . Patients treat oral betaadrenergics oral corticosteroid medication unstable dos ( i.e. , less six week stable dose ) dose excess equivalent 10 mg prednisone per day 20 mg every day . 7 . Patients regularly use daytime oxygen one hour per day . 8 . Patients complete pulmonary rehabilitation program six week prior screen visit patient currently pulmonary rehabilitation program . 9 . Patients limitation exercise performance result factor fatigue exertional dyspnea . 10 . Pregnant nursing woman . 11 . Women childbearing potential use two effective method birth control ( one barrier one nonbarrier ) .
